projects.title: Wizzard
projects.description: This is my final project for the Technigo bootcamp. It is a form, with eight questions, where each respons carries a point value. The value is added and a response is rendered, depending on the total score. The total score, the point value of each score and IP addresses are stored in MongoDB.

projects.title: Sign up & login
projects.description: Sign-up and login form built in React, with a backend in Node.js. Passwords are stored encrypted, and the user is issued an access token to authorize login

projects.title: CSS Grid
projects.description: In this project I have used CSS grid, in React, to create a grid with varying images sizes.

projects.title: Clock
projects.description: This project uses state in React to keep the time and change the color of the clock every thirty seconds.

projects.title: Sveriges Radio
projects.description: Here I am using JavaScript and React to fetch from the API of the Swedish Public Radio. The layout is done with FlexBox.

projects.title: Example Shop, React
projects.description: This was a group assignment at Technigo, sponsored by Tictail, to create a small webshop. Four students of Technigo, in collaboration with the developers of Tictail,worked together on this two week sprint. The shop products come from an API and is handled by Javascript in React.

projects.title: SASS
projects.description: Copying the front page of airline Norweigans search function, using SASS.

projects.title: Habit tracker
projects.language: HTML, CSS, JavaScript with React, data visualization with Rechart library
projects.description: This was a group assignment at Technigo, where three students built a habit tracker. It works as a to-do app, where one can add and remove tasks, but it also tracks daily and weekly progress.
